CustomField.description: Formula field used in 3 Day survey reminder and 6 day survey reminder, in the case that the Superintendent or the Ops Manager is the same as the Project Manager.
CustomField.formula: IF (Project_Manager_new__c = Project_Manager__c, Project_Manager_new__r.FirstName & " " & Project_Manager_new__r.LastName, Project_Manager_FirstName__c & " " & Project_Manager_LastName__c & " " & "and" & " " & Project_Manager_new__r.FirstName & " " & Project_Manager_new__r.LastName)
CustomField.label: PM Super Ops
